mapper.insert: insert into chart (idx, c_rank, name, artist, album, img_path, gnrcode) values (seq_chart.nextval, #{c_rank}, #{name}, #{artist}, #{album}, #{img_path} , #{gnrcode})
mapper.update: update chart set name = #{name}, artist = #{artist}, album = #{album}, img_path = #{img_path}, updateDate = sysdate where c_rank = #{c_rank} and gnrcode = #{gnrcode}
mapper.select: select c_rank, name, artist, album, img_path, regdate, updatedate, gnrcode from chart where c_rank > 0
select c_rank, name, artist, album, img_path from (SELECT /*+INDEX(chart XPK차트) */ c_rank, img_path, name, artist, album FROM chart WHERE gnrcode = #{gnrcode} )
select c_rank, name, artist, album, img_path, regdate, updatedate from chart where c_rank < 19 and gnrcode = 1

SELECT c_rank, img_path, name, artist, album, regdate, updatedate, gnrcode FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(chart XPK차트) */ rownum rn, c_rank, img_path, name, artist, album, regdate, updatedate, gnrcode FROM chart WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and gnrcode = #{gnrcode} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from chart where
c_rank > 0 and gnrcode = #{gnrcode}
